summary: This test suite validates the calendar manipulation utilities of the climate data processing library, checking functions that adjust day-of-year values across different calendar conventions, convert datasets between calendars, compute decimal years, determine days per year, ensure proper cftime array handling, retrieve calendar types, interpolate time coordinates, calculate percentile day-of-year, and generate time bounds.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate handling of various calendar systems in climate and environmental data workflows, supporting reliable temporal analyses and model evaluations.
